price: 13 Qu’avez-vous donc à ne pas craindre Allah dans toute Sa gloire,
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
